import React, { useRef } from "react"; import useOnClickOutside from "../../hooks/useOnClickOutside"; import "./MovieModal.css"; function MovieModal({ backdrop_path, title, overview, name, release_date, first_air_date, vote_average, setModalOpen, }) { const ref = useRef() useOnClickOutside(ref, () => {setModalOpen(false)}); // 바깥을 누르면 모달 창이 닫히게 return (
setModalOpen(false)} className='modal-close'> X

100% for you {release_date ? release_date : first_air_date}

평점: {vote_average}

) } export default MovieModal;
